sentence.Network_en: Edelweiss ( Leontopodium alpinum ) is one of the best known European mountain flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 是菊科的一种花,也叫火绒草.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Leontopodium sinense Hemsl (Compositae) is a commonly-used Tibetan medicine.华火绒草Leontopodium sinense Hemsl系菊科火绒草属植物,是一种常用藏药。
